headline: Invesco Advisers, Inc. Announces Expiration of Tender Offers for Invesco Trust for Investment Grade New York Municipals and Invesco Pennsylvania Value Municipal Income Trust
summary: Invesco Advisers, Inc., a subsidiary of Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), announced today the preliminary results of the previously announced tender offers for Invesco Trust for Investment Grade New York Municipals (NYSE: VTN) and Invesco Pennsylvania Value Municipal Income Trust (NYSE: VPV) (each, a "Fund" and collectively, the "Funds"). Each tender offer expired at 11:59 p.m., New York City time, on Monday, December 9, 2024 (the "Expiration Date").

raw.headline: Invesco Advisers, Inc. Announces Expiration of Tender Offers for Invesco Trust for Investment Grade New York Municipals and Invesco Pennsylvania Value Municipal Income Trust
raw.summary: Invesco Advisers, Inc., a subsidiary of Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), announced today the preliminary results of the previously announced tender offers for Invesco Trust for Investment Grade New York Municipals (NYSE: VTN) and Invesco Pennsylvania Value Municipal Income Trust (NYSE: VPV) (each, a "Fund" and collectively, the "Funds"). Each tender offer expired at 11:59 p.m., New York City time, on Monday, December 9, 2024 (the "Expiration Date").
